Kevin Munc

Blade Runner + 16

25 Oct 2017

The original Blade Runner movie came out in 1982. 16 years later, I arrived in Hong Kong for the first time. It was after midnight, the streets were steamy, people and neon everywhere. It reminded me strongly of Blade Runner. I’ll never forget it.

I just saw Blade Runner 2049 tonight. Now I’m wondering where I’ll go in 2033…
